name: Bunny Bells
description:
Bunny Bells: Collect bells to fill yourself with joy and start jumping! With enough joy, you're able to jump on your own, but once you're out of air jumps, you'll need to either collect lots of bells or find special bells!

The bunny will follow your finger and jump when you touch the screen twice with another finger.

Programming by Darrick Hilburn; made for GAME 255 at Johnson County Community College

Music credits:

"Life of Riley" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
